document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Absent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Place </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">April </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Daffodils </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">a'blow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Homesick </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#502c44">curiosity </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Souls </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">snow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Drift </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">block </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">Deeper </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Daffodil </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">delight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">duplicate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Absent place an April day
